item.title: Mark Zuckerberg dines with Trump at Mar-a-Lago
item.description: Donald Trump dined on Wednesday with Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg at the president-elect's Mar-a-Lago club in Florida, bringing together the Facebook foun...

item.title: Texas has right to build razor wire border wall, appeals court rules
item.description: A federal appeals court ruled Wednesday that the Biden administration overstepped when it tried to dismantle Texas's razor-wire border fence.

item.title: Mexico's president agrees to stop migration into U.S. after tariff threats, Trump says
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump said Mexico has agreed to stop the flow of migrants north into the U.S.

item.title: Ohio governor signs bill banning opposite-sex bathroom, locker room use at schools
